title: Overheard At Deer
content:
[[include theme:3law]]

[[[Those Twisted Pines Hub]]] >> Overheard At Deer

[[include component:preview
text= Deer College is the premier occult college adjacent to the Northweastern United States. It is also the only one to be haunted by a terrible seltzer water.
]]
